definitions.text: assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
examples: he wanted his share in cash

definitions.text: any of the equal portions into which the capital stock of a corporation is divided and ownership of which is evidenced by a stock certificate
examples: he bought 100 shares of IBM at the market price

definitions.text: the allotment of some amount by dividing something
examples: death gets more than its share of attention from theologians

definitions.text: the part played by a person in bringing about a result
examples: I am proud of my contribution in advancing the project
they all did their share of the work

definitions.text: a sharp steel wedge that cuts loose the top layer of soil

examples: Our children share a love of music
The two countries share a long border

definitions.text: have, give, or receive a share of
give out as one's portion or share

examples: I'd like to share this idea with you
